https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/bqBVZucNhvPLBTt0s7SDXvL6Ejc.jpg Young lovers, Seung-hyeon and Ji-a, were drifted apart without even getting a chance to open themselves up. 7 years later, they meet again in their hometown. Embracing their feelings for each other at last, they fall in love once again and share cherishable moments together. A Way Station
